trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can be used to present a collection of objects on a design surface.

The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> is the second key [!INCLUDE[avalon1](~/includes/avalon1-md.md)] control provided by the [!INCLUDE[wf2](~/includes/wf2-md.md)] designer infrastructure that is collection based.

While the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter> enables the display and the editing of a single contained element, the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> is collection based, displays a visualization, and supports editing of the collection of items provided by the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.Items%2A> property.

In addition to allowing the multiple items contained in the collection to be visualized and edited, the `WorkflowItemsPresenter` also enables collection-oriented actions, such as inserting an item at a given index in the collection, deleting an item from the collection, and moving an item from one index to another.

`WorkflowItemsPresenter` also handles combined actions, such as dragging between the various presenters and allowing that edit to occur in a single, undoable action.Use <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter> to present a single object on a design surface.

For an example of the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter> in use, see the [Custom Composite Designers - Workflow Items Presenter](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/custom-composite-designers-workflow-items-presenter.md) sample.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the type of item supported by the presenter.
The `Type` of item supported by the presenter.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.AllowedItemType"></xref> dependency property.
Returns a Boolean that indicates whether the specified objects can be pasted.
The list of objects to be pasted.
`true` if the specified list of objects can be pasted; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the object for resolving types used by the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.View.TypeResolvingOptions"></xref> object for resolving types used by the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemPresenter.DroppingTypeResolvingOptions"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the `DataTemplate` that defines how the footer section of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref> control is displayed.
A `DataTemplate` that defines how the footer section of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref> control is displayed.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.FooterTemplate"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the `DataTemplate` that defines how the header section of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref> control is displayed.
A `DataTemplate` that defines how the header section of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref> control is displayed.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.HeaderTemplate"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the string that contains the hint text for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref> control.
The hint text for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref> control.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.HintText"></xref> dependency property.
Identifies the index dependency property.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the current designer is the default container.
`true` if the current designer is the default container; otherwise, `false`.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.IsDefaultContainer"></xref> dependency property.
Gets or sets the collection used to generate the content of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref>.
A `ModelItemCollection` used to generate the content of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref>.
Gets or sets the template that defines the panel that controls the layout of items.
An `ItemsPanelTemplate` that defines the panel to use for the layout of the items.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.ItemsPanel"></xref> dependency property.
By providing a custom panel template, you can customize and control the layout of the contained items.
The default <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.ItemsPanel%2A> is based on a vertically oriented `StackPanel`.
As an illustration, the `ItemsPanel` for the designer of <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Parallel> activities is based on a horizontally oriented `StackPanel`.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.Items"></xref> dependency property.
Returns a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref>-specific `AutomationPeer` implementation for the [!INCLUDE[avalon1](~/includes/avalon1-md.md)] infrastructure.
Implement this method in your derived class to add class handling for this event.
The type-specific `AutomationPeer` implementation.
Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.
Provides data for the drag event.
Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.
Provides data for the drag event.
Invoked when an object is dragged into the bounds of a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref> control.
Implement this method in your derived class to add class handling for this event.
The `DragEventArgs` instance that contains the event data.
Invoked when a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref> object is initialized.
Implement this method in your derived class to add class handling for this event.
The `EventArgs` instance that contains the event data.
Informs the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref> that a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> was moved.
If `modelItem` is in <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.Items%2A>, it is removed.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> that was moved.
Occurs when the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> instances are cloned.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> instances to be copied.
The copied items.
Occurs when the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> instances are cut.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> instances to be cut.
A clone of itemsToCut.
Occurs when the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> instances are deleted.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> instances to be deleted.
Invoked after the start of a move operation to complete the moving of the specified item.
The items that has been moved.
Pastes the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> instances to the specified location.
The items to be pasted.
The metadata associated with the items to be pasted.
The location of the paste.
A reference to the paste point.
Sorts the selected items.
The selected items to be sorted.
The list of the sorted items.
Gets or sets the `DataTemplate` that defines how the spacer of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref> control is displayed.
A `DataTemplate` that defines how the spacer of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter"></xref> control is displayed.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowItemsPresenter.SpacerTemplate"></xref> dependency property.
